mention.text: president of the episcopal conference , in which the guerrillas respond to recent statements by the prelate , interpreted by the farc as a mediation offer

a letter released today that was sent to cardinal alfonso lopez trujillo , president of the episcopal conference , in which the guerrillas respond to recent statements by the prelate , interpreted by the farc as a mediation offer
the simon bolivar guerrilla coordinating board , founded in september 1987
the simon bolivar guerrilla coordinating board
the simon bolivar guerrilla coordinating board
the simon bolivar guerrilla coordinating board
the final phase being postponed on several occasions since last december
us , '' the farc commanders state in their letter
the farc commanders state in their letter
the only one determined to continue a sabotage campaign against the elections , characterized by kidnappings
